response.overview: Two Ugandan women, Monic Karungi and Kayla Birungi, died in Dubai in 2022 after falling from high-rise buildings, bringing renewed and devastating attention to the exploitative "Dubai Porta Potty" trend. The BBC's Africa Eye investigated the cases, revealing that the rumors surrounding Karungi's death hid an even darker reality of sexual exploitation and human trafficking.
response.title: Death in Dubai #DubaiPortaPotty
